member.name: T:Gemstone.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Defines extensions for setting up configuration defaults for Gemstone projects.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderExtensions.ConfigureGemstoneDefaults(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder,Gemstone.Configuration.Settings)
member.summary: Configures the builder using the defined settings from Gemstone project configuration sources.
member.param: The configuration builder.
Settings for configuring default sources.
member.remarks:
This extension function configures common configuration sources for a Gemstone project. The instance controls the configuration sources that are available. Handling of settings are defined in a hierarchy where the settings are loaded are in the following priority order, from lowest to hightest:
INI file (defaults.ini) - Machine Level
INI file (settings.ini) - Machine Level
SQLite database (settings.db) - User Level
Environment variables - Machine Level
Environment variables - User Level

member.name: M:Gemstone.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderExtensions.ConfigureGemstoneDefaults(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder,System.Action{Gemstone.Configuration.AppSettings.IAppSettingsBuilder},System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures the builder using the default configuration sources for Gemstone projects.
member.param: The configuration builder.
Action for configuring default app settings.
INI file can be produced in lieu of a UI for configuration.
Use SQLite for user configuration storage.
Use environmental variables for configuration.
Split long description lines into multiple lines.
member.remarks:
This extension function configures common configuration sources for a Gemstone project. The provided parameters control the configuration sources that are available. Handling of settings are defined in a hierarchy where the settings are loaded are in the following priority order, from lowest to hightest:
INI file (defaults.ini) - Machine Level
INI file (settings.ini) - Machine Level
SQLite database (settings.db) - User Level
Environment variables - Machine Level
Environment variables - User Level

member.name: P:Gemstone.Configuration.Eval.TypeRegistry
member.summary: Gets the global used to resolve types for [eval] typed settings.
member.remarks: Applications can register more types and symbols with this property for use with [eval] settings. Ensure the types are registered before settings get bound to configurations sources, see .

member.name: P:Gemstone.Configuration.Eval.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the result of the expression evaluation. Value is cached.
member.remarks: When is uninitialized, i.e., null, expression will be evaluated to acquire a result. Further requests will return cached result value. To re-evaluate expression, set to null before getting property.

member.name: T:Gemstone.Configuration.SettingNameAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that defines the setting name of a property or field in a class for settings when serializing the value to the configuration file.
member.remarks: This attribute allows consumers to override the name of the setting going into the configuration file, if the attribute doesn't exist the property or field name is used.

member.summary: Creates a new with the specified value.
member.param: Assigns name(s) used to serialize setting into config file.

member.summary: Gets the name used to serialize field or property into config file.

member.summary: Gets the names used to serialize field or property into config file.
